ruleset.name: Apex Design Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex design issues (structure, method signatures, class organization)

rule.name: NoUnnecessaryReturnVariables
rule.message: Variables created solely for return statements should be inlined. Return the expression directly instead
rule.description:
Variables created solely for return statements should be inlined. Return the expression directly instead of creating an intermediate variable. This reduces unnecessary indirection and improves code clarity.
Version: 1.0.0
